short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save the environment by watching the carbon footprint of the ingredients in your food.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our project reads the recipe on the screen and picks out the ingredients that emit a high amount of carbon per calorie. We suggest alternatives to that ingredient based on its food class and carbon emission data.
